alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Denton; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Denton, northeastern Tarrant and northwestern Dallas Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carrollton, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Irving, Carrollton, Frisco, Richardson, Lewisville, Flower Mound, Euless, Grapevine, Coppell, The Colony, Farmers Branch, Southlake, Addison, Hebron, DFW Intl Airport, Grapevine Lake and Lewisville Lake. This includes Interstate 35E between mile markers 435 and 452. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
